p: In contrast, among the 90 patients who were found to be positive for influenza A by ImunoAce Flu, 44 patients were found to be negative by Linjudge FluA/pdm and were confirmed to have A/H3N2 infection by RT-PCR. Moreover, 4 patients who were found to be positive by Linjudge FluA/pdm were diagnosed with H3N2 by RT-PCR. In total, 48 patients, including 4 patients for whom Linjudge FluA/pdm yielded a false-positive for H1N1pdm09, were diagnosed with H3N2 virus infection by RT-PCR. Thus, the specificity of Linjudge FluA/pdm was 91.7% (44/48, 95%CI: 80.0â€“97.7).
